[USER]: Me and my boyfriend are planning a movie night, can you find us something to watch? [SYSTEM]: Of course! What kind of movie do you fancy? [USER]: I'm thinking drama.. can you find something directed by Robin Bissell? [SYSTEM]: I've found this 1, how do you feel about The Best of Enemies? [USER]: Yes, The Best of Enemies would be perfect! [SYSTEM]: Great, do you want me to rent it for you? [USER]: Yes please, no subtitles though [SYSTEM]: Okay, just to confirm, are you happy for me to rent The Best of Enemies with no subtitles? [USER]: Yes please! How much will it cost? 
 [slot] media_2-director, it indicates Name of the director of the movie. So the value of slot <media_2-director> is
